website_summaries.verdict: A great all-around workout powder that will give you the energy to start and maintain the endurance to keep going for hours.
pros: Gives you energy, assists with muscle growth and replenishes electrolytes
Mixes in well and doesn't leave a chalky residue
cons: Not the cheapest option out there

customer_reviews.title: Sickeningly Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely disgusting! It tastes like Koolaid with 4 extra cups of sugar! I can't believe they sell something that is supposed to aid in a workout that is so disgustingly sweet! I couldn't drink it to see if it actually did what it says it does because it gave me a stomachache!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Contains Sucralose.
customer_reviews.text: Love product but contains Sucralose, and i do not promote artificial sweetners. As a Personal Trainner I am all about "whole food".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good taste but sweet and it does serve it's purpose
customer_reviews.author: Jae myles

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Great taste without the sugary taste. Helps me take less rest days between workouts. Really great for biking.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Better than the others I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I gained about 6 pounds of muscle!!! Being thin this was definitely needed. It also has ingredients to give you extra energy, that other products don't have.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Clean Taste - For During and Immediately After
customer_reviews.text: This is a sweet candy tasting drink with a blue color. It tastes clean and clear, there is no chalkiness or bitter flavors. Although this has a strong fruity type candy flavor it goes down easily. This is a combination BCAA drink and rehydration drink for use during a workout and/or immediately after. The directions state we can have up to 3 of these drinks a day. This supplement claims to increase endurance during a workout, reduce fatigue amd build and repair muscle. A small Scoop in 8 ounces of water dissolves fast. Rating 5 stars = Love It.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineMM

customer_reviews.title: Great for intermittent fasting, not the best flavor
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is a lot like children’s bubble gum flavored tooth paste. I do intermittent fasting so I need some BCAAs for morning rides to protect muscle mass. I like to mix a big scoop of BCAAs into my camelbac water bottle and drink while I ride. I got a few intermediate rides in, while fasting, using this powder. I felt strong the whole ride and there was no weakness after the ride. So it does what it’s supposed to do. I do not mind the flavor, but it’s not my favorite. The colder, the better.
customer_reviews.author: trbizwiz

customer_reviews.title: A little too sweet
customer_reviews.text: While this hydrating powder is effective (has helped power through several intense series of cross-fit classes), it is on the too sweet side. I can't drink this at the suggested ratio but cut it in half with extra water. But it does seem to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Epilady

customer_reviews.title: Calorie content not listed.
customer_reviews.text: The label lists ingredients and daily values, but says nothing about calories. Indeed, one has to go on line and do some sleuthing to find out calorie content. Why? I found—and find—that worrying. Who markets supplements that way? The fact that the flavor is cloyingly, disgustingly sweet was the final straw. No.
customer_reviews.author: Worddancer Redux

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sweet
customer_reviews.text: This is a good-tasting workout powder that might be on the "too sweet" side. I dealt with that by watering it down. Other than that, I like the way it tastes more than others.
customer_reviews.author: Vine Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great BCAA
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest BCAA I’ve tried. If you don’t like the flavor there are many others to choose from. Got mine through Force Factor directly. Couldn’t be more pleased. No calories either is an extra bonus.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Bubble gum bhlack :(
customer_reviews.text: Bubble gum taste is yuck. Gotta gulp it to get it down. Adding lemon helps. Originally not too bad but the aftertaste is gross.
customer_reviews.author: VW Smith

customer_reviews.text: My brother got energy from this. He uses it for his pre work out routine. The taste isn’t bad and it was easy to make. He noted tingiling feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Raven RAVE!

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several energy drinks and pre-workouts over the last five years to only find myself going back to what I started with. Easy to mix with water in your blender bottle, this drink is pretty sweet - too sweet. It was pretty sickeningly sweet... I had to dilute it and my husband snaps at me when I do dilute it- mainly because I have too many bathroom breaks if I water it down and sometimes I water it down so much that it becomes ineffective. If used as directed and if you can get over the taste, it works.
customer_reviews.author: J + W

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this 5 times now and I do have better energy and endurance. I got daring on Saturday and upped my bench press weight 40 pounds from my usual setting and I was able to do 6 reps. I can't be sure it's not a placebo effect, but the taste is good and it's better than the 2 other flavors I have tried. I'm to the point that I like it better than Gator Aid.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Stamper

customer_reviews.title: For intra or post workout consumption.  Refreshes and hydrates.  Helps build muscle?
customer_reviews.text: A hydrating intra-workout sports drink . . . I'm thinking of it as a Gatorade type product in a mix-your-own powder form. Maybe more than just hydration as this product claims to help synthesize muscle (contains branched chain amino acids). 30 servings form this 8.5 oz. container (mix one scoop with 8 oz of cold water). Mixes fairly well and this Arctic Gumball flavor has a decent taste. Does it build muscle? I don't know - it's supposed to. But its refreshing enough so I'll give it some time and we will see.
customer_reviews.author: T.M. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good at keeping fatigue away!
customer_reviews.text: This works well to keep fatigue away. I did three days at Disneyland from 8:00 - midnight and didn’t feel it like I usually do. I had a glass of this mid-day and was surprised at how well I felt at park closing. I know this is an unconventional application, but when you spend so flipping much to go to Disneyland, it is nice to be able to really enjoy every minute of it. I will use it for workouts too, just wanted to throw an extra perk of it out there 😉
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: This totally tastes like blueberry bubblegum. I love it. It's great for hydrating mid-workout. I don't know that it does anything to build lean muscle or reduce fat or any of that. I know it tastes great, and like a good sports drink gives me the energy to keep going in a tough workout. That's really all I can ask from a product such as this. It can also wash easily out of a white t-shirt. Don't ask.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Reisner

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves quickly and taste good.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. I got Tropical Punch. It mixes well and quickly with water. I felt better during and after a workout. Im trying a different BCAA to see if there is s difference. Well, I feel the same but this other one sits on top of the water and doesnt dissolve quickly so I'll be reordering Force Factor once Im done.
customer_reviews.author: michelle tyson

product_meta.title: Force Factor Pure BCAA Hydrating Intra-Workout Powder with 2:1:1 BCAA Ratio to Build Lean Muscle, Reduce Fatigue, and Improve Endurance, 30 Servings, Tropical Freeze
product_meta.description: Flavor:Tropical FreezePure BCAA is Force Factor’s premium, great-tasting intra-workout sports drink, specifically developed to keep you fueled and hydrated to enhance athletic performance. Designed for both men and women, Pure BCAA helps build and repair muscle, reduce fatigue, and improve endurance. When you’re in the middle of a grueling workout, there’s nothing you want more than a refreshing BCAA sports drink that doesn’t just taste great and go down smoothly, but actually helps push you through that extra mile or last set. Pure BCAA contains two primary blends that are combined with additional electrolytes to help you perform at your peak and fully Unleash Your Potential.
feature_bullets: BUILD & REPAIR MUSCLE: The 2:1:1 Instantized BCAA Complex in Pure BCAA is packed with vital branched-chain amino acids to replenish essential compounds lost during exercise. It contains leucine, isoleucine, and valine in a precise ratio that can easily be absorbed by your body, helping you build, repair, and maintain lean muscle.

REDUCE FATIGUE: Rhodiola and CherryPURE, a tart cherry skin powder, are combined in the EnduraPURE Blend to help maximize peak oxygen consumption. That means you can train longer and harder while feeling less sore.
IMPROVE ENDURANCE: Pure BCAA also contains a precisely crafted matrix of electrolytes, key for hydration management to support optimal athletic performance and help you power through your workouts.

AMAZING FLAVOR: Don’t get distracted by the terrible, chalky taste of other BCAAs. Pure BCAA comes in amazing flavors that mix effortlessly with cold water, making it the obvious choice for athletes looking to optimize their gains. It tastes so great that you’ll want to drink it all day long!
